content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'SILVER_CLIENTE' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE SILVER.D_CLIENTE
	(
	 [ID_CLIENTE] int,
	 [NOME_CLIENTE] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ENDERECO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [NUMERO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ID_CIDADE] int,
	 [CEP] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_SILVER_CLIENTE
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.SILVER_CLIENTE
(ID_CLIENTE 1, NOME_CLIENTE 2, ENDERECO 3, NUMERO 4, ID_CIDADE 5, CEP 6)
FROM 'https://adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/silver/cliente'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.SILVER_CLIENTE
GO
